description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth says Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot Grok will join Google’s AI engine inside the Pentagon network.

title: Pentagon Is Embracing Musk's Grok AI Chatbot as It Draws Global Outcry
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said Monday that Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot Grok will join Google’s generative AI engine in operating inside the Pentagon network, as part of a broader push to feed as much of the military's data as possible into the developing technology.

title: Mamata questions EC over 'AI-driven' electoral roll errors: 'Why revert to 2002?'
description: In her fifth letter since the SIR exercise began, Banerjee claimed that the manual voter lists of 2002 were scanned and transliterated using artificial intelligence tools in the absence of a digitised database of the last SIR.
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee, on Monday, wrote again to Chief Election Commissioner (CEC) Gyanesh Kumar, alleging that “AI-driven” errors in the digitisation of the 2002 electoral rolls have caused widespread hardship to genuine voters ... [3817 chars]

title: Nvidia says no upfront payment needed for its H200 chips
description: The company said it "would never require customers ‌to pay ‌for products they do not receive", in a response ‌to a Reuters story on January 8 about the company having imposed unusually stringent terms requiring full upfront payment from Chinese customers seeking ​its artificial intelligence chips.

title: Alphabet’s Rise To $4 Trillion Cements Status As AI Trade Winner
description: Alphabet Inc. broke above a $4 trillion market capitalization on Monday, becoming one of the few companies to ever cross the threshold as investors increasingly see the Google parent as one of the biggest winners of the artificial intelligence boom. Shares closed up 1% at $331.86, translating to a market cap of just over $4 trillion. The company recently overtook Apple Inc. to become the second-largest firm, behind Nvidia Corp.
content:

title: Amazon has big hopes for wearable AI - starting with this US$50 gadget
description: Several months after Amazon.com Inc bought artificial intelligence hardware startup Bee, the company said it's working to make its US$50 always-listening wearable more proactive, and indicated a larger revamp is in store.

title: Alphabet’s rise to $4 trillion cements status as AI trade winner
description: Alphabet Inc. has crossed the $4 trillion market cap, becoming a leading player in the AI boom. With a significant partnership with Apple and strong stock performance, Alphabet is positioned as a dominant force in artificial intelligence, outpacing competition and attracting investor confidence.
